title: Our History
blurb: From local roots to national acclaim.
content: Founded in 2004, our company began as a small ensemble in a community hall.
Over two decades, we've grown to tour across the UK and beyond, telling timeless stories.
We continue to champion bold productions, local talent, and inclusive theatre for all ages.

title: Meet the Team
content: Our team includes award-winning directors, choreographers, designers, and educators.
With a shared love of storytelling, each member brings their own spark to the stage.
From rehearsal room to final bow, their passion drives every production.
